outputs.output_descr: The RBA Senior Economist Programme aims to reinforce the capacities of RBA countries for more dynamic policy work in order to facilitate the interanalization and therefore better application of the MDG-based planning processes and translation of the MDG needs assessments into medium-term planning frameworks underpinned by MDG-consistent macroeconomic policies. This objective will be met through the provision of the services of an additional 22 International Field Economists so that all the RBA countries are covered. The Economists will help to spearhead the RRs/RCs and UN System's enhanced policy work as well as the corresponding strengthening of the capacities of host Governments' central planning and line ministries, and central banks ans statistical offices.

To contribute to accelerating progress towards the attainment of the MDGs in at least 40 RBA countries through strengthened national technical and institutional capacities to formulate, implement and effectively monitor MDG-based national development and poverty reduction strategies as well as facilitating partnerships in support of them.

donor_name: THE WILLIAM AND FLORA HEWLETT FOUNDATION

project_title: RAF06002 Support MDG-Based Nt'l Dev. & Poverty Reduction
